title: Racing Post newspaper typefaces
content:
Hi there, I am looking for several typefaces used in the Racing Post newspaper. The Racing Post logo and the main body text, also the header text if that's different?

Thanks in advance.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Racing-Post-Front-Page-29th-November-2006-Kauto-Star-given-green-light-for-Tingle-Creek-b\_368340.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20141123082756/http:/typophile.com/files/Racing-Post-Front-Page-29th-November-2006-Kauto-Star-given-green-light-for-Tingle-Creek-b_368340.jpg) | 82.28 KB |
| [Blackheath0003.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20141123082756/http:/typophile.com/files/Blackheath0003.jpg) | 387.53 KB |
author: buda

comments.content:
Racing Post: Frutiger Black (or Bold) Italic  
Headers (and body?): Adobe Chaparral
I think the body text is [Charter](http://web.archive.org/web/20141123082756/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/charter-bt-pro/).
